name: The (SCOPUS/ISI) SOAS GLOCAL Conference on Asian Linguistic Anthropology 2022/2023
content: The (SCOPUS/ISI) SOAS GLOCAL Conferences on Asian Linguistic Anthropology 2022/2023\. Dates: Online Virtual - Dec 19-21, 2022 / Physical In-Person - May 16-19, 2023\. Locations: Online Virtual - http://cala2021.upd.edu.ph. Physical - University of The Philippines, Diliman Cohost: SOAS University of London, U.K. The (SCOPUS / ISI) GLOCAL CALA - the annual conference, workshops, and lectures on the Linguistic Anthropology, Sociolinguistics, and Language and Society, of Asia. Theme: ‘Symbol and Society’. Papers: Should discuss the ways in which communication takes on both evolutionary and revolutionary form, following recent significant changes in Asian society, and in Asia’s new and revised interrelatedness across global scapes. Abstract Submission deadline: Online Virtual - November 20, 2022 / Physical - March 13, 2023\. Contact: Head of Communications: Ms. Nhan Huynh, Samantha Emery https://cala2021.upd.edu.ph/contact. More details. All papers accepted to the Proceedings will be SCOPUS/ISI indexed.
organizers: The SOAS GLOCAL, The SOAS Global Council for Anthropological Linguistics & University of The Philipp
